verses.verse: And it came to pass <S%H2985><s%>, when Jabin king <S%H4428><s%> of Hazor <S%H2674><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> thereof <S%H7971><s%>, that he sent to Jobab <S%H3103><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Madon <S%H4068><s%>, and to the king <S%H4428><s%> of Shimron <S%H8110><s%>, and to the king <S%H4428><s%> of Achshaph <S%H407><s%>,

and to the kings <S%H4428><s%> that were on the north <S%H6828><s%>, in the hill-country <S%H2022><s%>, and in the Arabah <S%H6160><s%> south <S%H5045><s%> of Chinneroth <S%H3672><s%>, and in the lowland <S%H8219><s%>, and in the heights <S%H5299><s%> of Dor <S%H1756><s%> on the west <S%H3220><s%>,

to the Canaanite <S%H3669><s%> on the east <S%H4217><s%> and on the west <S%H3220><s%>, and the Amorite <S%H567><s%>, and the Hittite <S%H2850><s%>, and the Perizzite <S%H6522><s%>, and the Jebusite <S%H2983><s%> in the hill-country <S%H2022><s%>, and the Hivite <S%H2340><s%> under Hermon <S%H2768><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Mizpah <S%H4709><s%>.

And they went out <S%H3318><s%>, they and all their hosts <S%H4264><s%> with them <S%H7227><s%>, much people <S%H5971><s%>, even as the sand <S%H2344><s%> that is upon the <S%H3220><s%> sea-shore <S%H8193><s%> in multitude <S%H7230><s%>, with horses <S%H5483><s%> and chariots <S%H7393><s%> very <S%H3966><s%> many <S%H7227><s%>.

And all these kings <S%H4428><s%> met together <S%H3259><s%>; and they came <S%H935><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> together <S%H3259><s%> at the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Merom <S%H4792><s%>, to fight <S%H3898><s%> with Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Joshua <S%H3091><s%>, Be not afraid <S%H3372><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of them <S%H4279><s%>; for to-morrow at this time <S%H6256><s%> will I deliver them up <S%H5414><s%> all slain <S%H2491><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>: thou shalt hock <S%H6131><s%> their horses <S%H5483><s%>, and burn <S%H8313><s%> their chariots <S%H4818><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>.

So Joshua <S%H3091><s%> came <S%H935><s%>, and all the people <S%H5971><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%> with him <S%H4325><s%>, against them by the waters of Merom <S%H4792><s%> suddenly <S%H6597><s%>, and fell upon them <S%H5307><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> delivered <S%H5414><s%> them into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and they smote <S%H5221><s%> them <S%H7291><s%>, and chased them unto great <S%H7227><s%> Sidon <S%H6721><s%>, and unto Misrephoth-maim <S%H4956><s%>, and unto the valley <S%H1237><s%> of Mizpeh <S%H4708><s%> eastward <S%H4217><s%>; and they smote <S%H5221><s%> them <S%H7604><s%>, until they left them none remaining <S%H8300><s%>.

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> unto them as Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> bade <S%H559><s%> him <S%H6131><s%>: he hocked their horses <S%H5483><s%>, and burnt <S%H8313><s%> their chariots <S%H4818><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>.

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> turned back <S%H7725><s%> at that time <S%H6256><s%>, and took <S%H3920><s%> Hazor <S%H2674><s%>, and smote <S%H5221><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> thereof with the sword <S%H2719><s%>: for Hazor <S%H2674><s%> beforetime <S%H6440><s%> was the head <S%H7218><s%> of all those kingdoms <S%H4467><s%>.

And they smote <S%H5221><s%> all the souls <S%H5315><s%> that were therein with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword <S%H2719><s%>, utterly destroying <S%H2763><s%> them <S%H3498><s%>; there was none left that breathed <S%H5397><s%>: and he burnt <S%H8313><s%> Hazor <S%H2674><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>.

And all the cities <S%H5892><s%> of those kings <S%H4428><s%>, and all the kings <S%H4428><s%> of them <S%H3091><s%>, did Joshua take <S%H3920><s%>, and he smote <S%H5221><s%> them with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword <S%H2719><s%>, and utterly destroyed <S%H2763><s%> them <S%H4872><s%>; as Moses the servant <S%H5650><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%>.

But as for the cities <S%H5892><s%> that stood <S%H5975><s%> on their mounds <S%H8510><s%>, Israel <S%H3478><s%> burned <S%H8313><s%> none of them <S%H2108><s%>, save Hazor <S%H2674><s%> only <S%H3091><s%>; that did Joshua burn <S%H8313><s%>.

And all the spoil <S%H7998><s%> of these cities <S%H5892><s%>, and the cattle <S%H929><s%>, the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> took for a prey <S%H962><s%> unto themselves <S%H120><s%>; but every man they smote <S%H5221><s%> with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword <S%H2719><s%>, until they had destroyed <S%H8045><s%> them <S%H7604><s%>, neither left they any that breathed <S%H5397><s%>.

As Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> his servant <S%H5650><s%>, so did Moses <S%H4872><s%> command <S%H6680><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%>: and so did <S%H6213><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%>; he left <S%H5493><s%> nothing <S%H1697><s%> undone <S%H5493><s%> of all that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.

So Joshua <S%H3091><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> all that land <S%H776><s%>, the hill-country <S%H2022><s%>, and all the South <S%H5045><s%>, and all the land <S%H5045><s%> of Goshen <S%H1657><s%>, and the lowland <S%H8219><s%>, and the Arabah <S%H6160><s%>, and the hill-country <S%H2022><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and the lowland of the same <S%H8219><s%>;

from mount <S%H2022><s%> Halak <S%H2510><s%>, that goeth up <S%H5927><s%> to Seir <S%H8165><s%>, even unto Baal-gad <S%H1171><s%> in the valley <S%H1237><s%> of Lebanon <S%H3844><s%> under mount <S%H2022><s%> Hermon <S%H2768><s%>: and all their kings <S%H4428><s%> he took <S%H3920><s%>, and smote <S%H5221><s%> them <S%H4191><s%>, and put them to death.
60 <S%H3091><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> war <S%H4421><s%> a long <S%H7227><s%> time <S%H3117><s%> with all those kings <S%H4428><s%>.

There was not a city <S%H5892><s%> that made peace <S%H7999><s%> with the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, save the Hivites <S%H2340><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Gibeon <S%H1391><s%>: they took <S%H3947><s%> all in battle <S%H4421><s%>.

For it was of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> to harden <S%H2388><s%> their hearts <S%H3820><s%>, to come against <S%H7125><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> in battle <S%H4421><s%>, that he might utterly <S%H2763><s%> destroy them <S%H8467><s%>, that they might have no favor, but that he might destroy <S%H8045><s%> them <S%H3068><s%>, as Jehovah commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> came <S%H935><s%> at that time <S%H6256><s%>, and cut off <S%H3772><s%> the Anakim <S%H6062><s%> from the hill-country <S%H2022><s%>, from Hebron <S%H2275><s%>, from Debir <S%H1688><s%>, from Anab <S%H6024><s%>, and from all the hill-country <S%H2022><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, and from all the hill-country <S%H2022><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: Joshua <S%H3091><s%> utterly <S%H2763><s%> destroyed them with their cities <S%H5892><s%>.

There was none of the Anakim <S%H6062><s%> left <S%H3498><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: only in Gaza <S%H5804><s%>, in Gath <S%H1661><s%>, and in Ashdod <S%H795><s%>, did some remain <S%H7604><s%>.

So Joshua <S%H3091><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the whole land <S%H776><s%>, according to all that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>; and Joshua <S%H3091><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> it for an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> unto Israel <S%H3478><s%> according to their divisions <S%H4256><s%> by their tribes <S%H7626><s%>. And the land <S%H776><s%> had rest <S%H8252><s%> from war <S%H4421><s%>.
